title: Ragnar Benson-Homemade C-4-A Recipe for Survival (1990)pdf
description:
Book: Homemade C-4
Author: Ragnar Benson
Language: eng
ISBN13: 9780873645584
ISBN10: 0873645588
Publisher: Paladin Press (1990)
ASIN: B00A6GAFCG
Pages: 44

This isnt a Great scan,pages are a little crooked in places,but still very readable.

Note : This is not Real C-4,However the yield is comparable to TNT.

Some Reviews from Amazon-
   The homemade C-4 book of uncle Ragnar is an excellent book, even for non-chemists. he describes how to make an extremely powerful explosive from just two ingredients. It isn't actual C-4 as for military uses, but it do the job. If you are intelligent, finding the chemicals isn't hard.
   
   It was a great book. Very Informing. I've read several books on survivalism pertaining to home made explosives, this is one of the best. I believe the price Amazon is asking for is a little outrageous... But that was about 4 years ago. A lot of the material is outdated, like Ammonium Nitrate. Ever since Mr. McVeigh went Ryder happy, they stopped selling Ammonium Nitrate based fertilizer, but I'm sure there are other sources of Ammonium Nitrate. In conclusion, it's a great book no survivalist should be caught without
